select op.o_no as o_no, op.op_no as op_no, p.s_no as s_no, ot.m_email as m_email, d.d_address as d_address, d.d_detail_address as d_detail_address, d.d_name as d_name, ot.d_msg as d_msg, ot.o_total_price as o_total_price, ot.o_sale_price as o_sale_price, ot.o_pay_price as o_pay_price, ot.o_pay_type as o_pay_type, ot.o_date as o_date, p.p_no as p_no, p.p_name as p_name, op.op_qty as op_qty, p.p_sell_price as p_sell_price
from order_tab ot left join ORDER_PRODUCT op on ot.o_no = op.o_no left join DELIVERY d on ot.d_no = d.d_no left join PRODUCT p on op.p_no = p.p_no order by ot.o_no desc
